last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Galvanized by their duty to their loved ones, Gun-woo and Woo-jin tread forward to take down Myeong-gil — once and for all.

name: Bloodhounds
overview: Two young boxers band together with a benevolent moneylender to take down a ruthless loan shark who preys on the financially desperate.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Two young boxers band together with a benevolent moneylender to take down a ruthless loan shark who preys on the financially desperate.

tagline: Their Biggest Fight is Not in The Ring.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After a thrilling boxing match, Kim Gun-woo befriends Hong Woo-jin. Kim Myeong-gil's business ambitions come into focus, with dangerous tactics at play.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Gun-woo meets with Choi Tae-ho to remedy his mother's debt. Myeong-gil endures a humiliating meeting with Hong Min-beom and grows revengeful.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Gun-woo and Woo-jin figure out how to take down the scam ring. Myeong-gil gains the upper hand on Min-beom.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: After the group faces a close call, President Choi plans his own operation. But as their plans fall into place, the enemies stand in their way.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After narrowly escaping a threat, the group trains for what's coming — and President Choi and his men look to extract valuable information.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The group celebrates as they get ready for their next move. More exposed than ever before, Myeong-gil goes after President Choi and his guards.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: After an unthinkable setback, Gun-woo and Woo-jin resolve to come back with a vengeance — later partnering with an unlikely figure.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Galvanized by their duty to their loved ones, Gun-woo and Woo-jin tread forward to take down Myeong-gil — once and for all.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Two young boxers band together with a benevolent moneylender to take down a ruthless loan shark who preys on the financially desperate.
